divs: sighting detailsat 12:52 am 08\03\09 est i viewed (with my opticam 1050) a star sized orb changing colors: red to green to yellow\white located wsw ~ 45 deg elev. i called my two daughters to view and confirm this sighting. next my wife viewed this multi-colored orb through the opticam 1050 and concurred on the color changes compared to saturn in the eastern sky. at ~ 1:03 am we sighted a second smaller star sized orb located n ~ 45 deg also changing colors in sync from red to green to yellow\white as the first orb. the sky was clear as we marked the time at 1:13, 1:22, and 1:30 am. the orbs maintained their general positions while dropping their elevation ~ 10 deg. within the 42 minutes of observation.
Summary: Four people saw two stationary orbs (WSW and N) changing color in synch from red to green to yellow/white at a 45 deg elevation.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Melvindale
There were no other sightings in Melvindale on or around August 3rd 2009
